short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It will show a new joke and put a smile on your face every time you open a new tab to search the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be Happy extension replaces your new tab page and will show a new joke every time you open a new tab to search the web.
It provides a custom search bar with results by Microsoft Bing on the new tab page.
It provides a new tab with jokes and local date and time.

Search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Be Happy extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.behappytab.com/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.behappytab.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://www.behappytab.com/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.behappytab.com/terms.html#terms-contact

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
